newsitem.title: HONG KONG: PT ABC President Enterprises gets US$10 mln loan.
newsitem.headline: PT ABC President Enterprises gets US$10 mln loan.

text.p: PT ABC President Enterprises Indonesia has signed a US$10 million revolving credit facility with four banks, arranger Sanwa Bank's Singapore branch said.
The borrower is a joint venture between PT ABC Central Food Industry and Taiwan's President Group to produce instant noodles.
The facility has a maturity of three years and pays a margin of 150 basis points over the Singapore Interbank Offered Rate.
Arranger Sanwa Bank's Singapore branch committed to US$2.8 million.
The Singapore branches of three other banks participated in the loan, taking US$2.4 million each. They are Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank, Hua Nan Commercial Bank and Sakura Bank.
